00228 BOOLEAN SetUICursor( UINT32 uiNewCursor )
00229 {
00230       guiOldUICursor = guiCurUICursor;
00231       guiCurUICursor = uiNewCursor;
00232 
00233       return( TRUE );
00234 }
00235 
00236 BOOLEAN DrawUICursor( )
00237 {
00238       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
00239       static BOOLEAN                                  fHideCursor = FALSE;
00240       LEVELNODE                           *pNode;
00241       UINT16                                    usTileCursor;
00242 
00243             //RaiseMouseToLevel( (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel );
00244 
00245       HandleLooseCursorDraw( );
00246 
00247 
00248       // OK, WE OVERRIDE HERE CURSOR DRAWING FOR THINGS LIKE
00249       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
00250       {
00251             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gViewportRegion , VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );    
00252 
00253             // Check if we are in the viewport region...
00254             if ( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
00255             {
00256                   DrawItemTileCursor( );
00257             }
00258             else
00259             {
00260                   DrawItemFreeCursor( );
00261             }
00262             return( TRUE );
00263       }
00264 
00265       if (GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos) )
00266       {
00267             gusCurMousePos = usMapPos;
00268 
00269             if ( guiCurUICursor == NO_UICURSOR )
00270             {
00271                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gViewportRegion , VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );    
00272                   return( TRUE );
00273             }
00274 
00275             if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_SHOWTILE )
00276             {
00277                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL )
00278                   {
00279                         pNode = AddTopmostToTail( gusCurMousePos, GetSnapCursorIndex( FIRSTPOINTERS3 ) );
00280                   }
00281                   else
00282                   {
00283                         pNode = AddTopmostToTail( gusCurMousePos, GetSnapCursorIndex( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].usAdditionalData ) );
00284                   }
00285                   pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00286                   pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00287 
00288                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL )
00289                   {
00290                         // Put one on the roof as well
00291                         AddOnRoofToHead( gusCurMousePos, GetSnapCursorIndex( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].usAdditionalData ) );
00292                         gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pOnRoofHead->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00293                         gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pOnRoofHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00294                   }
00295             }
00296 
00297             gfTargetDropPos = FALSE;
00298 
00299             if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_FREEFLOWING && !( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_DONTSHOW2NDLEVEL ) )
00300             {
00301                   gfTargetDropPos    = TRUE;
00302                   gusTargetDropPos = gusCurMousePos;
00303 
00304                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL )
00305                   {
00306                         // If we are over a target, jump to that....
00307                         if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
00308                         {
00309                               gusTargetDropPos = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
00310                         }
00311 
00312                         // Put tile on the floor
00313                         AddTopmostToTail( gusTargetDropPos, FIRSTPOINTERS14 );
00314                         gpWorldLevelData[ gusTargetDropPos ].pTopmostHead->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00315                         gpWorldLevelData[ gusTargetDropPos ].pTopmostHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00316 
00317                   }
00318             }
00319             
00320             if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_SHOWTILEAPDEPENDENT )
00321             {
00322                   // Add depending on AP status
00323                   usTileCursor = gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].usAdditionalData;
00324 
00325                   // ATE; Is the current guy in steath mode?
00326                   if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00327                   {
00328                         if ( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bStealthMode )
00329                         {
00330                               usTileCursor = FIRSTPOINTERS9;
00331                         }
00332                   }
00333 
00334                   if ( gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid || gsCurrentActionPoints == 0 )
00335                   {
00336                         usTileCursor = FIRSTPOINTERS6;
00337 
00338                         // ATE; Is the current guy in steath mode?
00339                         if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00340                         {
00341                               if ( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bStealthMode )
00342                               {
00343                                     usTileCursor = FIRSTPOINTERS10;
00344                               }
00345                         }
00346                   }
00347 
00348                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL )
00349                   {
00350                         pNode = AddTopmostToTail( gusCurMousePos, GetSnapCursorIndex( FIRSTPOINTERS14 ) );
00351                   }
00352                   else
00353                   {
00354                         pNode = AddTopmostToTail( gusCurMousePos,  GetSnapCursorIndex( usTileCursor ) );
00355                   }
00356 
00357                   pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00358                   pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00359 
00360                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL )
00361                   {
00362                         // Put one on the roof as well
00363                         AddOnRoofToHead( gusCurMousePos,  GetSnapCursorIndex( usTileCursor ) );
00364                         gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pOnRoofHead->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00365                         gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pOnRoofHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00366                   }
00367             }
00368 
00369       
00370             // If snapping - remove from main viewport
00371             if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_SNAPPING )
00372             {
00373                   // Hide mouse region cursor
00374                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gViewportRegion , VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );    
00375 
00376                   // Set Snapping Cursor
00377                   DrawSnappingCursor( );
00378             }
00379 
00380 
00381             if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_FREEFLOWING )
00382             {
00383                   switch( guiCurUICursor )
00384                   {
00385                         case  MOVE_VEHICLE_UICURSOR:
00386 
00387                               // Set position for APS
00388                               gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = FALSE;
00389                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 16;
00390                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 14;
00391                               break;
00392 
00393                         case  MOVE_WALK_UICURSOR:
00394                         case  MOVE_RUN_UICURSOR:
00395 
00396                               // Set position for APS
00397                               gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = FALSE;
00398                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 16;
00399                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 14;
00400                               break;
00401 
00402                         case  MOVE_SWAT_UICURSOR:
00403 
00404                               // Set position for APS
00405                               gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = FALSE;
00406                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 16;
00407                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 10;
00408                               break;
00409 
00410                         case  MOVE_PRONE_UICURSOR:
00411 
00412                               // Set position for APS
00413                               gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = FALSE;
00414                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 16;
00415                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 9;
00416                               break;
00417 
00418                   }
00419 
00420 
00421                   fHideCursor = FALSE;
00422 
00423                   if ( !fHideCursor )
00424                   {
00425                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gViewportRegion , gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].usFreeCursorName );    
00426 
00427                   }
00428                   else
00429                   {
00430                         // Hide
00431                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gViewportRegion , VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );    
00432                   }
00433 
00434             }
00435 
00436             if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_CENTERAPS )
00437             {
00438                   gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
00439             }
00440       }
00441       return( TRUE );
00442 }
00443 
00444 BOOLEAN HideUICursor( )
00445 {
00446       HandleLooseCursorHide( );
00447 
00448       // OK, WE OVERRIDE HERE CURSOR DRAWING FOR THINGS LIKE
00449       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
00450       {
00451             // Check if we are in the viewport region...
00452             if ( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
00453             {
00454                   HideItemTileCursor( );
00455                   return( TRUE );
00456             }
00457       }
00458 
00459       if ( guiCurUICursor == NO_UICURSOR )
00460       {
00461             //Do nothing here
00462             return( TRUE );
00463       }
00464 
00465       if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & ( UICURSOR_SHOWTILE | UICURSOR_SHOWTILEAPDEPENDENT )  )
00466       {
00467             RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS, FIRSTPOINTERS );
00468             RemoveAllOnRoofsOfTypeRange( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS, FIRSTPOINTERS );
00469       }
00470 
00471 
00472       if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_FREEFLOWING && !( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_DONTSHOW2NDLEVEL ) )
00473       {
00474             if ( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL )
00475             {
00476                   RemoveTopmost( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS14 );
00477                   RemoveTopmost( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS9 );
00478 
00479                   if ( gfTargetDropPos )
00480                   {
00481                         RemoveTopmost( gusTargetDropPos, FIRSTPOINTERS14 );
00482                         RemoveTopmost( gusTargetDropPos, FIRSTPOINTERS9 );
00483                   }
00484             }
00485 
00486       }
00487 
00488 
00489       // If snapping - remove from main viewport
00490       if ( ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_SNAPPING ) )
00491       {
00492             // hide Snapping Cursor
00493             EraseSnappingCursor( );
00494       }
00495 
00496       if ( gUICursors[ guiCurUICursor ].uiFlags & UICURSOR_FREEFLOWING )
00497       {
00498             // Nothing special here...
00499       }
00500 
00501       return( TRUE ); 
00502 }

00504 
00505 void DrawSnappingCursor( )
00506 {
00507       LEVELNODE                           *pNewUIElem;
00508       SOLDIERTYPE                                            *pSoldier;
00509       static BOOLEAN          fShowAP = TRUE;
00510 
00511       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
00512       {
00513                   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
00514 
00515       }
00516 
00517       // If we are in draw item mode, do nothing here but call the fuctiuon
00518       switch ( guiCurUICursor )
00519       {
00520             case NO_UICURSOR:
00521                   break;
00522 
00523             case NORMAL_SNAPUICURSOR:
00524 
00525                   AddTopmostToHead( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS1  );
00526                   gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pTopmostHead->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00527                   gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pTopmostHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00528                   break;
00529 
00530             case ALL_MOVE_RUN_UICURSOR:
00531             case CONFIRM_MOVE_RUN_UICURSOR:
00532                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00533                   {
00534                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, GOODRUN1, 0, -WALL_HEIGHT - 8, &pNewUIElem );
00535                   }
00536                   else
00537                   {
00538                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, GOODRUN1, 0, 0, &pNewUIElem );
00539                   }
00540                   pNewUIElem->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00541                   pNewUIElem->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00542                   break;
00543 
00544             case ALL_MOVE_WALK_UICURSOR:
00545             case CONFIRM_MOVE_WALK_UICURSOR:
00546                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00547                   {
00548                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, GOODWALK1, 0, -WALL_HEIGHT - 8, &pNewUIElem );
00549                   }
00550                   else
00551                   {
00552                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, GOODWALK1, 0, 0, &pNewUIElem );
00553                   }
00554                   pNewUIElem->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00555                   pNewUIElem->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00556                   break;
00557 
00558             case ALL_MOVE_SWAT_UICURSOR:
00559             case CONFIRM_MOVE_SWAT_UICURSOR:
00560                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00561                   {
00562                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, GOODSWAT1, 0, -WALL_HEIGHT - 8, &pNewUIElem );
00563                   }
00564                   else
00565                   {
00566                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, GOODSWAT1, 0, 0, &pNewUIElem );
00567                   }
00568                   pNewUIElem->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00569                   pNewUIElem->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00570                   break;
00571 
00572             case ALL_MOVE_PRONE_UICURSOR:
00573             case CONFIRM_MOVE_PRONE_UICURSOR:
00574                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00575                   {
00576                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, GOODPRONE1, 0, -WALL_HEIGHT - 8 - 6, &pNewUIElem );
00577                   }
00578                   else
00579                   {
00580                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, GOODPRONE1, 0, -6, &pNewUIElem );
00581                   }
00582                   pNewUIElem->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00583                   pNewUIElem->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00584                   break;
00585 
00586             case ALL_MOVE_VEHICLE_UICURSOR:
00587             case CONFIRM_MOVE_VEHICLE_UICURSOR:
00588                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00589                   {
00590                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, VEHICLEMOVE1, 0, -WALL_HEIGHT - 8, &pNewUIElem );
00591                   }
00592                   else
00593                   {
00594                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, VEHICLEMOVE1, 0, 0, &pNewUIElem );
00595                   }
00596                   pNewUIElem->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00597                   pNewUIElem->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00598                   break;
00599 
00600             case MOVE_REALTIME_UICURSOR:
00601                   break;
00602 
00603             case CANNOT_MOVE_UICURSOR:
00604 
00605                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00606                   {
00607                         AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, BADMARKER1, 0, -WALL_HEIGHT - 8, &pNewUIElem );
00608                         pNewUIElem->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00609                         pNewUIElem->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00610 
00611                         if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_3D_CURSOR ] )
00612                         {
00613                               AddTopmostToHead( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS13 );
00614                               gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pTopmostHead->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00615                               gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pTopmostHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00616                         }
00617 
00618                         AddOnRoofToHead( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS14 );
00619                         gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pOnRoofHead->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00620                         gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pOnRoofHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00621 
00622                   }
00623                   else
00624                   {
00625                         AddTopmostToHead( gusCurMousePos, BADMARKER1  );
00626                         gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pTopmostHead->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00627                         gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pTopmostHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00628 
00629                         if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_3D_CURSOR ] )
00630                         {
00631                               AddTopmostToHead( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS13 );
00632                               gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pTopmostHead->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00633                               gpWorldLevelData[gusCurMousePos].pTopmostHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00634                         }
00635                   }
00636                   break;
00637 
00638       }
00639 
00640       // Add action points
00641       if ( gfUIDisplayActionPoints )
00642       {
00643 
00644             if ( gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid )
00645             {
00646                   if ( COUNTERDONE( CURSORFLASH ) )
00647                   {
00648                         RESETCOUNTER( CURSORFLASH );
00649                         
00650                         fShowAP = !fShowAP;
00651                   }
00652             }
00653             else
00654             {
00655                   fShowAP = TRUE;
00656             }
00657 
00658             if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00659             {
00660                   AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, DISPLAY_AP_INDEX, SNAPCURSOR_AP_X_STARTVAL, SNAPCURSOR_AP_Y_STARTVAL - WALL_HEIGHT - 10, &pNewUIElem );
00661             }
00662             else
00663             {
00664                   AddUIElem( gusCurMousePos, DISPLAY_AP_INDEX, SNAPCURSOR_AP_X_STARTVAL, SNAPCURSOR_AP_Y_STARTVAL, &pNewUIElem );
00665             }
00666             pNewUIElem->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_DISPLAY_AP;
00667             pNewUIElem->uiAPCost = gsCurrentActionPoints;
00668             pNewUIElem->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00669             pNewUIElem->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00670 
00671             if ( !fShowAP )
00672             {
00673                   gfUIDisplayActionPointsBlack = TRUE;
00674             }
00675       }
00676 
00677 
00678 }
00679 
00680 void EraseSnappingCursor( )
00681 {
00682       RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( gusCurMousePos, MOCKFLOOR, MOCKFLOOR );
00683       RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS, LASTPOINTERS );
00684       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS, LASTPOINTERS );
00685       RemoveAllOnRoofsOfTypeRange( gusCurMousePos, FIRSTPOINTERS, LASTPOINTERS );
00686       RemoveAllOnRoofsOfTypeRange( gusCurMousePos, MOCKFLOOR, MOCKFLOOR );
00687 
00688 
00689 }

00692 
00693 void StartLooseCursor( INT16 sGridNo, UINT32 uiCursorID )
00694 {
00695       gfLooseCursorOn         = TRUE;
00696 
00697       guiLooseCursorID  = uiCursorID;
00698 
00699       guiLooseCursorTimeOfLastUpdate = GetJA2Clock( );
00700 
00701       gsLooseCursorGridNo = sGridNo;
00702 }
00703 
00704 
00705 void HandleLooseCursorDraw( )
00706 {
00707       LEVELNODE                           *pNewUIElem;
00708 
00709       if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiLooseCursorTimeOfLastUpdate ) > LOOSE_CURSOR_DELAY )
00710       {
00711             gfLooseCursorOn = FALSE;
00712       }
00713 
00714       if ( gfLooseCursorOn )
00715       {
00716             AddUIElem( gsLooseCursorGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS4, 0, 0, &pNewUIElem );
00717             pNewUIElem->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00718             pNewUIElem->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00719       }
00720 }
00721 
00722 
00723 void HandleLooseCursorHide( )
00724 {
00725       if ( gfLooseCursorOn )
00726       {
00727             RemoveTopmost( gsLooseCursorGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS4 );
00728       }
00729 }
00730 
00731 
00732 UINT16 GetSnapCursorIndex( UINT16 usAdditionalData )
00733 {
00734       // OK, this function will get the 'true' index for drawing the cursor....
00735       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_3D_CURSOR ] )
00736       {
00737             switch( usAdditionalData )
00738             {
00739                   case FIRSTPOINTERS2:
00740 
00741                         return( FIRSTPOINTERS13 );
00742                         break;
00743 
00744                   case FIRSTPOINTERS3:
00745 
00746                         return( FIRSTPOINTERS14 );
00747                         break;
00748 
00749                   case FIRSTPOINTERS4:
00750 
00751                         return( FIRSTPOINTERS15 );
00752                         break;
00753 
00754                   case FIRSTPOINTERS5:
00755 
00756                         return( FIRSTPOINTERS16 );
00757                         break;
00758 
00759                   case FIRSTPOINTERS6:
00760 
00761                         return( FIRSTPOINTERS17 );
00762                         break;
00763 
00764                   case FIRSTPOINTERS7:
00765 
00766                         return( FIRSTPOINTERS18 );
00767                         break;
00768 
00769                   case FIRSTPOINTERS9:
00770 
00771                         return( FIRSTPOINTERS19 );
00772                         break;
00773 
00774                   case FIRSTPOINTERS10:
00775 
00776                         return( FIRSTPOINTERS20 );
00777                         break;
00778 
00779                   default:
00780 
00781                         return( usAdditionalData );
00782             }
00783       }
00784       else
00785       {
00786             return( usAdditionalData );
00787       }
00788 }
